idea:
I like the problems because each problem has its unique solution and i love to give this unique solution to get the problem solved.
I am not so good in study but the most important thing that i have learnt from my engineering career is, making my thoughts creative.
Because of this i can see the world in different way.
Everyone can see the same thing in different way, depends on the mentality of that person.
I always used to see the world with some imperfection or something is need to be done to make it perfect.
This leads me to think and implement all the engineering concept to get the problem solved.
I am looking for someone,who can join me and help me to find the solution of the world's challenging problems.
That, we are facing nowadays....
name: Ramesh Rathod

idea: Have Started this venture with a vision to provide one store for all needs. Our aim is to provide best quality products to every women. Have planned to introduce virtual dressing to check your look.
name: FRIENDS ECOM ASSOCIATES

idea:
With the consumers becoming more aware of the unhealthy ingredients that many of the large mainstream beverage companies put into their carbonated beverages, they are turning away from big cola brands out of concern for their health. For years together there hasn’t been a healthier alternative to Colas & other Aerated Drinks. However, people still can't resist one as the immediate satisfaction of a chilled soda is unbeatable; especially in the heat or after a heavy meal. 

It is time to say goodbye to unhealthy, artificial soft drinks and say hello to the naturally crafted alternative. Presenting to you Granny’s Company that combines the satisfaction of a soft drink, with healthy yet tasty concoctions of your sweet old Daadi! 

It is preserved in traditional Indian methods ensuring the use of No artificial flavours or colours. It is sweetened with only cane sugar and/or with liquid jaggery in place of processed, full of diabetes-inducing high-fructose corn syrup sweeteners. Yeah, granny is pretty cool that way; always managing great taste while sneaking in what’s good for us!
 
 These fizzy marvels come in 6 thirst quenching variants with real ingredients. So now every Indian can go ahead and enjoy a chilled and satisfying drink that is free of artificial flavours, colours and every single worry that comes along with them.
name: Happy Indians FMCG Pvt. Ltd

idea:
MICROMENTIS is a private limited company, incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013. Micromentis provides technology and consultancy services to enable clients to create and execute strategies for their digital transformation. From engineering to application development, knowledge management and business process management, we help our clients to find the right solution of problems and to solve these effectively. Our team of innovators with expertise in Banking & Finance for more than 13 plus years, is differentiated by the imagination, knowledge and experience, across industries and technologies that we bring to every project we undertake.
Micromentis is a startup which provides services in information technology, Software Solution and Consultancy Services to BFSI sector. Currently Company is working on Digital Payments Products mainly into banking and finance i.e. ATM, POS, Wallet, CRM & Loyalty Solution, Transit & Mobility Payments, Integrated Host to Host Payment and Collection solution etc.
name: MICROMENTIS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The start-up is working on curbing honking pollution by providing incentives to people who honk lesser and lesser in time.
name: BUPP TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Gaia is a smart feedback and data analytics firm, actively involved in smart cities ecosystem in India. Gaia consulting team worked with 11 cities on the ICT component of Smart City Challenge plans, and is program management consultant for ICT for Agra, Aurangabad, Lucknow smart cities to design citywide ICT blueprint. Gaia has designed, built and deployed IOT LPWAN network and proprietary intermediation platform for multiple third party IOT solutions in Kakinada Smart City. Gaia has deployed IOT enabled citizen feedback solutions in 100+ cities and in major transport hubs (airports, metro, railways). Gaia has deployed sensor based cold chain monitoring solutions for clients in dairy, pharma, vaccines, cold logistics.

Gaia solutions blend internet of things, AI/Machine Learning, deep learning, data analytics, visualization and real time rules engine to enable cities and organizations to monitor people, processes, or assets. We build citizen engagement and feedback platforms. We build sensor based monitoring solutions. We build IOT platforms that enable last mile LPWAN connectivity for our and third party solutions. We have won social and business innovation awards, and been recognized by global & national technical awards for voice enabled machine learning led analytics on the edge.
name: Gaia Smart Cities Solutions Pvt Ltd

idea:
We believe that effective parking management is an essential tool to facilitate the efficient use of road space and to ensure free passage for pedestrians, cyclists, public transport, and motorists. In addition, appropriate parking fees can ensure that personal motor vehicle users compensate the city for the use of valuable land on which they park their vehicles. Parkr seeks to implement a modern parking system to improve parking operations, optimise usage of the available parking supply, and enhance the overall functioning of streets in the city.  
 
This was the reason for the rise of ‘Parkr’ as a start up in Mumbai to digitize the organized sector and organise the unorganised landscape of parking across the country.

We specialize in deploying a robust technology-based solution to integrate our mobile platform incorporating IoT, Data analytics and AI to increase convenience for the end consumer and partners. Our mechanism helps the end users search the parking space, navigate to the allocated area, book the spot in advance using digital payment method. This facilitates greater transparency and efficiency in the collection of parking fees and enforcement operations. For our partners, it assists delivering a WOW customer experience across multiple properties in parallel, reduce revenue leakages and contribute to be a healthier and cleaner environment.
name: STURDY PARKING SOLUTIONS (INDIA) PRIVATELIMITED

idea: We train people on Digital Marketing and also conduct a lot of workshops. We also consult clients in India and internationally on Digital marketing.
name: Skillopedia LLP
